Uses of Interface
net.viktorc.pp4j.api.ProcessExecutor

  • Packages that use ProcessExecutor 
    Package Description
    net.viktorc.pp4j.api  
    net.viktorc.pp4j.impl  

    • Uses of ProcessExecutor in net.viktorc.pp4j.api

      Subinterfaces of ProcessExecutor in net.viktorc.pp4j.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  JavaProcessExecutorService
      An interface for Java process pools that extends both the ProcessExecutorService and ExecutorService interfaces.
      interface  ProcessExecutorService
      An interface that outlines an executing mechanism for Submission instances in separate processes and allows for the tracking of the progress of the execution via Future instances.
      Methods in net.viktorc.pp4j.api with parameters of type ProcessExecutor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void ProcessManager.onStartup(ProcessExecutor executor)
      A method called right after the process is started.
      default boolean ProcessManager.terminateGracefully(ProcessExecutor executor)
      A method called to terminate the process.

    • Uses of ProcessExecutor in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl

      Classes in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl that implement ProcessExecutor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JavaProcessPoolExecutor
      A sub-class of ProcessPoolExecutor that implements the JavaProcessExecutorService interface.
      class  ProcessPoolExecutor
      An implementation of the ProcessExecutorService interface for maintaining and managing a pool of pre-started processes.
      class  SimpleProcessExecutor
      An implementation of the ProcessExecutor interface that allows for the running and management of a process based on a ProcessManager instance to enable the execution of submissions in this process.
      Methods in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl with parameters of type ProcessExecutor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SimpleProcessManager.onStartup(ProcessExecutor executor) 
      Constructor parameters in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl with type arguments of type ProcessExecutor 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleProcessManager(ProcessBuilder builder, Consumer<ProcessExecutor> onStartup)
      Constructs a manager for the processes created by the specified ProcessBuilder.
      SimpleProcessManager(ProcessBuilder builder, long keepAliveTime, Consumer<ProcessExecutor> onStartup)
      Constructs a manager for the processes created by the specified ProcessBuilder with the specified maximum life span.
